decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (P-402, P-403, and P-404 received: 25/09/2017. P-300, P-301, P-302 Rev A, P-303 Rev A, and P-304 received: 29/09/2017. P-502 Rev A, P-503 Rev A, P-504 Rev A, and P-505 Rev A received: 25/10/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The roof lights shall be 'conservation style', installed to be flush with the existing roof slope.
description: Joint application for erection of side roof extensions to both the houses with one side roof light to each property.
